dcterms:creator: D. M. R. Rianto
L. P. Wisesa
S. Hans
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 2,751 tweets in Indonesian, categorized into two labels indicating potential anxiety or depression (label 1) and non-anxiety or depression (label 0). The dataset is used for detecting depression and anxiety in Twitter users.
dcterms:title: Depression and Anxiety in Twitter (ID)
